welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Havixbeck, a charming and picturesque town known for its beautiful landscapes and welcoming community. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
